statements: SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE access_level = 'admin';
SELECT username, access_level FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_access_control WHERE access_level = 'user';
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT username, password FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE access_level='admin';
SELECT username FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_access_control ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id < 5 OR access_level='user';
SELECT user_id, username, access_level FROM user_access_control WHERE access_level='user' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_base_permissions WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT permission_id, permission_type FROM knowledge_base_permissions WHERE section_id = 3;
SELECT username, role FROM user_access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(permission_id) FROM knowledge_base_permissions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY count(permission_id) DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_type FROM knowledge_base_permissions WHERE section_id = 2 AND permission_type = 'read';
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM user_access_control WHERE role = 'user';
SELECT * FROM user_roles;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT section_id FROM permissions;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE user_id = 1 AND role_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, section_id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE section_id = 2 AND permission_type = 'read';
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS user_count, role_id FROM user_roles GROUP BY role_id HAVING user_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM user_roles JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE user_roles.user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY user_roles.user_id ASC, roles.role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name;
SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN roles r ON u.role = r.role_name JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.user_id JOIN permissions p ON up.permission_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id;

SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name, Permissions.permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id JOIN RolePermissions ON Roles.role_id = RolePermissions.role_id JOIN Permissions ON RolePermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) AS num_roles FROM UserRoles GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_roles > 2;
SELECT * FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id WHERE Users.username = 'John'
SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id WHERE Users.user_id = 1

SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name, Permissions.permission_name FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id JOIN RolePermissions ON Roles.role_id = RolePermissions.role_id JOIN Permissions ON RolePermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id
SELECT Users.username, COUNT(UserRoles.role_id) AS total_roles FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id GROUP BY Users.username

SELECT Users.username, Roles.role_name, COUNT(Permissions.permission_id) AS total_permissions FROM Users JOIN UserRoles ON Users.user_id = UserRoles.user_id JOIN Roles ON UserRoles.role_id = Roles.role_id JOIN RolePermissions ON Roles.role_id = RolePermissions.role_id JOIN Permissions ON RolePermissions.permission_id = Permissions.permission_id GROUP BY Users.username, Roles.role_name
